Series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children
Notes: First Reborn-One Hundred released, and the first release from the Universal Century timeline. First and currently the only RE/100 kit to use MP2 plate runner. Largest and most expensive RE/100 kit. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).
First release from the canonical UC timeline. Uses the H plate runner of Master Grade|MG-187 for weapons.

Series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny
Notes: Includes a booklet containing Chapter 3 of the ''Blue Destiny'' Vol. 1 manga.
First transformable/separable kit in the series. Also the first RE/100 kit to have bilingual Japanese/English text on its box packaging and instruction manual.
Includes four clear display stands for Wire-Guided 3-Barrel Beam Guns/Claws.
Includes 170mm cannon for the P-Bandai exclusive MG MSA-003 Nemo (Unicorn Desert Color Ver.).
Released as part of Bandai's ''"UC NexT 0100" project''. Includes two different cockpit hatches.
Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of ''Char's Counterattack'' and as part of Bandai's ''"UC NexT 0100" project''. Includes effect parts for funnels.
Uses G and H plate runners of MG-127 for frame and beam shield effect part. Released as part of Bandai's ''"UC NexT 0100" project'' and to commemorate the 25th anniversary of ''Victory Gundam''.
Parts and color variant of RE-009.

Series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
Notes: Uses no polycaps. Includes additional head parts to create Commander Type and Type-B variants. First 1/100 scale Gunpla kit ever to have hands where the back of the hand substitutes the palm, similar to a High Grade model, rather than having the usual complete hands. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of ''Gundam 0080''.

Series: Mobile Suit Gundam UC: One of Seventy Two
Notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-006. Uses the J, K, M, and O plate runners of MG-167. Includes additional water slide decal sheet.

Series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny
Notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive clear color variant of RE-005 to promote "Gundam Build Fighters World".
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-006.
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-008.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-002. Includes water slide decal sheet.
P-Bandai exclusive release. Requires three Action Base 1 or Action Base 4 units for aerial poses.
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-009.

(sold separately).

Notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-011 with new parts. First press release includes additional water slide decal sheet for mobile suits from ''Victory Gundam'' in MG and RE/100. Released to commemorate the 25th anniversary of ''Victory Gundam''.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE/100 Type89 Base Jabber. Requires three Action Base 1 or Action Base 4 units for aerial poses.
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-011. Includes water slide decal sheet.

Notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-009. Includes water slide decal sheet.
